price: Au wanataka kufanya vitimbi tu? Lakini hao walio kufuru ndio watakao tegeka.
arabic: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ
footnotes: Au wanataka kukufanyia vitimbi tu na kuuharibu Ujumbe wako? Basi hao walio kufuru ndio wanao stahiki kutumbukia katika vitimbi vyao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: am yurīdūna kaydan fa-alladhīna kafarū humu al-makīdūna
